scripts.cf:package: aws cloudformation package --template-file infrastructure.yaml --output-template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --s3-bucket blog-aws-lambda-devicedev --profile blog
scripts.cf:deploy: aws --region us-east-1 cloudformation deploy --template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name blog-resolver-dev --parameter-overrides ProjectName=blog Environment=development --profile blog
scripts.build: npm i && mkdir -p build && npm run cf:package
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run cf:deploy
